0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[jp]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link IN ('sequel', 'follows', 'followed by')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
1:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
  AND cn.name = 'DreamWorks Animation'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='10,000-mile-club'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL
    AND t.production_year > 1950
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
2:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('superhero', 'marvel-comics', 'based-on-comic', 'tv-special', 'fight', 'violence', 'magnet', 'web', 'claw', 'laser')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NOT NULL
    AND t.production_year > 2000
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
3:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='character-name-in-title'
    AND lt.link IN ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in')
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.title = 'Shrek 2'
  AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2005
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(worldwide)%'
    AND t.production_year = 2007
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link ='features'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
6:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%' AND (mc.note LIKE '%(co-production)%' OR mc.note LIKE '%(presents)%')
    AND t.production_year > 2000
  AND (t.title LIKE '%Freddy%'
       OR t.title LIKE '%Jason%'
       OR t.title LIKE 'Saw%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'murder-in-title', 'blood', 'violence')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND t.episode_nr >= 5 AND t.episode_nr < 100
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code != '[us]'
    AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL AND (ct.kind ='production companies' OR ct.kind = 'distributors')
    AND k.keyword IN ('murder', 'blood', 'gore', 'death', 'female-nudity')
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follows%'
    AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%(USA)%'
  AND mc.note LIKE '%(200%)%'
    AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2007 AND 2008
  AND t.title LIKE '%Kung%Fu%Panda%'
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;

21:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
    AND t.title != '' AND (t.title LIKE 'Champion%' OR t.title LIKE 'Loser%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
22:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code !='[pl]' AND (cn.name LIKE '20th Century Fox%' OR cn.name LIKE 'Twentieth Century Fox%')
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
    AND lt.link LIKE '%follow%'
    AND mc.note IS NULL
    AND t.production_year >2000 AND (t.title LIKE 'Birdemic%' OR t.title LIKE '%Movie%')
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
23:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS from_company,
       MIN(lt.link) AS movie_link_type,
       MIN(t.title) AS non_polish_sequel_movie
    FROM company_name AS cn,
        company_type AS ct,
        keyword AS k,
        link_type AS lt,
        movie_companies AS mc,
        movie_keyword AS mk,
        movie_link AS ml,
        title AS t
    WHERE cn.country_code ='[jp]'
    AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
    AND k.keyword ='sequel'
    AND lt.link IN ('sequel', 'follows', 'followed by')
    AND mc.note LIKE '%(Blu-ray)%'
    AND t.production_year >2010
    AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id
    AND ml.movie_id = t.id
    AND t.id = mk.movie_id
    AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
    AND t.id = mc.movie_id
    AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
    AND mc.company_id = cn.id
    AND ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id
    AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id
    AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
